description: Episode of Series "Biology program. Unit 4. Physiology". Live photography, microphotography, animated drawings and medical demonstrations illustrate the functions, diversions and specific tasks of the nervous system. Shows how it conveys information from sense organs to brain, co-ordinates information with experience and directs muscles and other organs to carry out adaptive behaviour.
